siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: There's no value in complaining about weather
frontmatter.description: We can't control nor change the weather. We can predict. We can prepare. We can respond accordingly.

frontmatter.title: Harness technology to increase effective efforts
frontmatter.description: Technology should be considered as a tool. Tools can make processes easier and change the entire process.

frontmatter.title: Stay focused by taking time to reflect, pause, respond
frontmatter.description: It's easy to lose focus when others don't react as expected. Don't let it derail efforts.

frontmatter.title: Focus projects on a single purpose to reduce distractions
frontmatter.description: Do more by taking on fewer disparate projects. Look for the projects that will make others easier or unnecessary.

frontmatter.title: Declare objective & importance, allot time accordingly
frontmatter.description: Declare objective & importance, allot time accordingly
